wikipedia_page.main: Ian Brennan (born 25 March 1953) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender. He played in the Football League for Burnley and Bolton Wanderers, making more than 230 first-team appearances in total, and later had spells in non-league football with Colne Dynamoes and Burnley Belvedere.

response: * Ian Brennan (music producer) (born 1966), American music producer
* Ian Brennan (writer) (born 1978), American television writer, actor, producer and director
